turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I wanted to make an order from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want three I want three large pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the first one I want black olives, on the second one I want your all meat combo pizza, and on the third one I want chicken impasto.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. what kind of crust do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just regular pan, and I want extra cheese on all three of those.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so i have 3 large pizzas black olives, all meat and the third chicken and pesto. extra cheese on all three.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, can you repeat that back to me one more time?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 large pizzas. one is with black olives, the second is all meat and the third is chicken and pesto. extra cheese on all pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You got a How much is that going to be?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total will be $72 plus tax.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wow, it's a little pricey. Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're all set. your pizzas will be ready for pickup soon at bela luna's.

items.name: meat and the third chicken and pesto
meat and the third is chicken and pesto
